# LED Grid Builder

> Visual tool to build and preview LED grids from MAX7219 modules. Configure module type, number and arrangement, color, then show text, numbers, icons, or draw your own; try static, blinking, and scrolling display with fit and flow options.

## Overview

- **Purpose**: Help users design and preview MAX7219-based LED matrix layouts and content before deploying to hardware.
- **Audience**: Makers, developers, and hobbyists using 8×8, 8×32, or 32×32 MAX7219 LED modules (red, green, or blue).
- **Output**: In-browser preview only; no code or firmware is generated by this app.

## Main entry

- [LED Grid Builder](__SITE_URL__): Single-page application. No login required.

## Optional

- **Module types**: MAX7219 8×8 (single), 4-in-1 8×32, 32×32. Multiple modules can be combined (e.g. 4× 8×8 in a square).
- **Content**: Text/numbers (with fit modes), preset icons (radiation, biohazard, heart, etc.), or a drawable 8×8 canvas.
- **Display**: Static, blinking, or scrolling (with direction and speed). Dark/light theme.
